Gopal is my favorite vegan eatery in Barcelona!  The sandwiches are super messy and delicious and the potatoes are delicious & positively drenched in yummy sauce.  Even though it physically pains me to do so, I eat every bite and STILL soldier my way through a donut afterwards.  The service is pretty slow for a deli environment but it's definitely worth it.  Bonus points for all the cool vegan posters & art on the walls.
